title: Dark Angels eSports team looking for a ADC and a TOP Laner
body:
Hey all! 
Dark Angels is a OCE team looking for two new members (preferred roles mentioned in title).

Important things
-Must live in Western Australia (as we will be competing at RFLan)  https://www.facebook.com/events/681589758686545/
http://www.rflan.org/
-Any rank is fine for now
-Must be able to use the discord link above as most team communication will be on here (However we may use TeamSpeak or Skype, as currently one of our members cannot use discord).

This team is Dark Vengeance's second team.

Roles needed
~~Mid~~
~~Jungle~~
~~Support~~
~~ADC~~
Top

Add me on League or discord for more info
League: Sir Dawnfire (soon to be DA Dawnfire)
Discord: DA Dawnfire#4259

replies.body:
Hey man,

I am an ADC main (heavily main Ezreal atm but can play Lucian, Vayne, Cait and Sivir... willing to practice more if needed)

I'm currently in London on EUW server as i have been living here this year but I will be back in WA in early December! I often attend RFLAN anyway but am normally the only one of my friends that plays LoL so, i enter a Pug team.

My IGN on OCE is: Ruke23 (currently bronze on that account as i left Aus just after placements and didnt do too well xD I'm Currently Silver 2 on EUW though!)

Willing to d/load discord once I'm home if needed!

Cheers!

We already have an ADC, I do apologize for not informing you earlier

Are you able to top lane ? As we are still looking for one

Aww, really? Damn! Was super keen to be in a team for RFLAN!
Nah I'm not the best top laner... Have a friend that could have played top but, we might have to make our own team now instead! =P
See you there, I guess! 
Good luck! =D

I'll be interested to see if you're able to find a team for RFLAN, I am the Owner of **Dark Vengeance**, and **Dark Angels**, Sir Dawnfire is just the team captain of **Dark Angels**.

Best of luck, and if you would like to have a scrim if you do manage to get a team, you can add me in game and message me!

IGN: **DV Silent Resent**

Hey, so sorry! Been trying to reply to this all day but my phone has been messing around and not letting me post for some reason!!

I have a few friends that still play every now and then...
Went to RFLAN with a full team once... 3 of them hadn't been before and haven't been since!
We have 3 confirmed players so far. 
ADC(me) 
1 mate for top
And 1 mate for jung/support
Then have 1 tentative. 
So hopefully, just looking for a Mid. 
Happy to try set up scrims if we can find a time that suits everyone  =)
Just out of interest; what elo are the players on your main team?
I'll add you when I get back to Aus in December, if that's okay? =P

I really enjoy playing with/against high elo players... I learn a lot by being punished in lane for lazy shit... Don't get that in Silver! xD 
Laning with a high elo support is always good too! They normally teach me a lot without even saying anything!
I like having the direction in the mid/late game too... I'm normally fine to make when I'm in the right place, I just have trouble working out where the right place is! xD

Alright cool! I'll let Silent know that you're up for some scrims. Feel free to join the DV Discord with you and ur friends once u get back to AUS.

And our ELO Ranges from Silver-Diamond (And i ended season 6 in bronze lol, same with our supp i think).

**Dark Vengeance** has the elo of Gold V average, by 2017 we're all planning to be Silver or Higher by Janurary. I'm going to be grinding the ranks myself this season to come, I haven't played much solo ranked, but I need to do it for myself xD

But we can be a good opponent, some of our players have been playing together for years, for example, our bot lane duo. 
Message me on the client whenever you've managed to get a team, most likely, the best times for **Dark Vengeance** are weekends for scrims / tournaments. 

Although **Dark Angels** is the second team, we're about the same skill as a team. We are going to test that later today with a friendly scrim against each other, see how we go and see what we can improve on as teams. 

IGN: **DV Silent Resent**

Sounds good guys, cheers!
We should have a team ready soon by the looks of things =)

We were going to have a best of 3 scrim, however unfortunately our support was unavailable

We did get one match in with one of our sub players as support. The rest of the scrim we didn't get in as i had to go for dinner and our sub player and top laner were unavailable when i got back 

The first match ended in **Dark Vengeance**'s victory. However in my opinion both teams put up a strong fight and **Dark Angels** performed extremely well as no one in the team had played together before.

Sorry man, I would have given you priority but i wasn't sure when you were going to reply.

Yeah see you there!

Still need to find a top laner xD

Not a problem, I understand... I'm currently 8 hours behind you, that's all =P

Tbh, this is the first time I have looked at this forum! I just randomly decided to check if there was any teams recruiting on oce for when I get home. (Just wanted some more people to play with and watch/talk about lcs with, I guess xD)
Then I saw this for a WA based team! Was almost too good to be true!  xD
Thanks anyway! I'll add you when I'm back in Aus, maybe we can play a few games together =D

All good man! And ye we should play some games/do scrims when you get back :)

And if you want, there are sub positions open for DA if you still don't have a team by RF

I just realised one of my comments didn't post! I posted saying I would add you when I got back to Aus in December.
I also have a friend that CAN play Top but normally plays Jung/Support.
I've got another friend now that mains Top so, just need a Mid and a Jung/support =D

Also, I started a YouTube channel a couple of years ago, if you are interested... Only posted a few videos before my computer needed upgrading to continue recording/streaming but;

This is probably my best Vid:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ebfq9ladWo


Hoping to start recording/streaming again when I'm home =D

Awesome! I'll have a look at ur channel now :)

I have a channel as well at www.youtube.com/c/LightBytes

Awesome! I'll add you next time i'm on :) RFLan 56 tickets go on sale November 26th (and the actual event in Jan 14/15 i believe)

And don't worry this season i didn't do well on my placements either xD

And yeah discord would be great as most of the team communication/times for team practices will be on the discord server.
for $$$ i can help xd
I'm broke af :P
Ello?

Hi

(or do you mean ELO?)

In the case of elo

Any rank is fine (preferably silver and above, although i can't say much cos i ended up in bronze this season)
Team captain need to get his elo up xD
Ahaha yep xD

UPDATE: Changed my discord name to DA Dawnfire

I have updated the post accordingly
